item.description:
Back to School Burger night !

$5 Dollar burgers - a great selection of gourmet burgers and yummy onion rings. Otherwise a full menu and good selection of draft beers and Celtic Libations.

Please don't RSVP and not show up. Last time we made reservations for 29 and less than 20 showed up. They brought in extra staff just for us and it made me look like a clown at a place that I like to frequent. If you're not sure that you can attend, please put maybe. But PLEASE don't say yes and not show up! Thatâ€™s very discourteous !!

p.s. - I liked the burger with Peanut butter and pickles...
item.how_to_find_us: It's a Monday - we'll be the only ones there !

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: $5 Burgers & Beers at the Kinsale Inn - Mattapoisett
